website_summaries.verdict: Works well for kids or adults who need durable materials that will last. Ships with field markers, too.
pros: Contains enough flags for 10 players (two teams of five)
Heavy-duty nylon belts and flags are durable
Belts use D-ring closures for adjustable fit
All items ship in a handy carrying case
cons: Hook and loop pads on the belts are glued instead of sewn and can come loose

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big ass kid. Way bigger than everyone else playing flag. Height and weight wise. He's not some chunk but he's definitely BIG. The belts fit him well with room to grow. I was very happy with this since a lot of things for his age don't for him. He wears size 12/14 I think and they fit. So if you have a bigger boy, rest assured these will fit. The flags themselves are of really good quality as well. They are of a thicker plastic and are very durable. They've survived a whole season through games and practices and not one has ripped or torn. This included the flag belt keeper pieces as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Dirty Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Does not come as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 7 yr old. He did like it and it will hold up well for his level. The photo shows (and advertised) a stylish carrying bag as a bonus. The item arrived in a draw string nylon bag, and not the nice rectangular bad shown in the photo. It was inside an Amazon warehouse clear bag. It would have been nice to give the present in the bag shown in the picture. So if you're buying as a gift for a kid, also go buy a nice gift box. Otherwise it looks like an open item or part of something else.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Strong

customer_reviews.title: Belts are small!
customer_reviews.text: States these are for adults, but man if you are anything more than a 36” waiste you’re going to have a hard time getting these belts on. Had our first flag game today and half of my players had to double up on belts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turkey Bowl!!! Good times!!
customer_reviews.text: Never been much of a flag football flag kind of guy i've always preferred tackle football, but in recent years i have realized i dont bounce back as good as i use to. Therefore, im am now a flag football kind of guy. I purchased this set to play with my son, friends, and family for our yearly Turkey Bowl game. Ever since then i have been very satisfied with this product. Have used it multiple games with kids and young adults, so far havent had one rip on me. Great for the price. Pros: Sturdy, Easy to use, wrap around belt with flags attached by velcro so they come off invidually. Price Cons: none at this moment.
customer_reviews.author: Israel M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set for flag football. The belts use metal loops for tightening, which worked fine except for one of our players was a little bigger and none of the belts fit him. He had to loop two together. Time will tell how the velcro holds up. But for the first few uses the product has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I teach PE to middle schoolers and high schoolers. Our old flag football set needed to be replaced. After searching online, I decided on this set. I have a limited budget and this was not only affordable, but is of better quality than some of the other pricey sets. The students like this set better than last year's set. Students of various sizes (petite girls to husky boys) were able to adjust the belts comfortably. The backpacks are a nice way to transport the belts to the field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how quickly these shipped. I definitely can see that this is a quality product. I love that it also comes in a handy carrying case! After playing with the belts and flags, I can say without a doubt that these are some of the best flags I have used. They are very easy to hold on to. I also love the fact that this product ships with 3 flags instead of the 2 that most others ship with. It really shows how dedicated the team at Trained Sports is when the owner himself contacts you to make sure you received the product on time 5/5 would bug from Trained Sports again!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lopes

customer_reviews.title: good price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good price and great product! My son is 8 and played flag football a couple years now. He got this in his Easter basket and was excited to bring it to our family party that afternoon. Some of the guys in the family (ten of them ages 8-55) got together in the yard to play a game. They all had a blast! Great memories for my son for sure. My husband was suprised with the quality. The product is very well made. I have no concerns about it lasting for many years to come. I would recommend this product for all ages and would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son's 7th birthday. He was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 7th birthday. He was so excited. We haven't tried it out yet but it seems to have everything and it seems to adjust to fit him (he's about 50 lbs). I just downloaded the playbook they sent in the follow up email (nice touch with that) so we'll see how it goes once he starts playing.
customer_reviews.author: SAK

customer_reviews.title: BBQ & flag football
customer_reviews.text: The kit had everything except a football & playbook rules. However, I was emailed a playbook to print out. My first day using it was for my family BBQ. One of flags detached from the Velcro (smh). So the person had to improvise by tying it around the belt. The belts itself were great size, as they fit young kids & older adults. The cones(4) could've been a Lil taller in height to recognize while playing. My suggestion, order 4 cones that stand tall in height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Flags fee like they're made of good quality. My biggest complaint is the quality of the velcro and stich work on those. As you can see from my photo, the stitching is done very poorly and I have concern for the overall durability/lifespan on those.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and a competitors product for our flag teams. Overall, I give the Trained product a rating above the competitor. While the belts are the same type of material and clasp, the kids love that they are black material not white. No idea why. As for me, I think the flags are thicker material and hang straighter. Also, the competitor tightly folds their flags for shipping whereas the trained product is folded in half which made them more usable right away. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beck

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and much happier with these flags.
customer_reviews.text: We've used the clip belts and were not happy with the product. I decided to give these flags a try and received feedback from my coaches that they prefer these flags over the clips and other velcro flag belts. We used the new belts last weekend, and it help move the game faster since the kids were able to put the flags back on the belt themselves. So far we like the flags and the quality is much better than what we can buy at the large box stores. We have three weeks remaining in the season so I'm interested to see how these flags fair when our season is over.
customer_reviews.author: E Flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Flag Football set
customer_reviews.text: Such a great flag football set! My 5 year old son will be starting to play on a flag football team and this is perfect to help him prepare. The whole family is able to play and not only do we have a blast, but he is able to learn the game as well. Definitely recommend for anyone who enjoys getting outside, having fun with family and friends and getting a little exercise as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Size of the belts
customer_reviews.text: Everything was made great and came in a handy bag. I got the men’s size for teenage boys and some of the kids the belts barely fit. Definitely can’t be used with bigger men. Overall great purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Amburgy

customer_reviews.title: We traveled with it & even use it in the pool :)
customer_reviews.text: We used it in the swimming pool (have to be creative when you have kids). Good quality too!!
customer_reviews.author: na

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as shown. The flags cane frayed and there was no box. It looks like someone bought, used and returned then they sent it to me. I’m so disappointed. Looks like a used old present.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for receds
customer_reviews.text: My students kept fighting at recess over their football game. So this set helped to stop their fights and make the game fair.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ann Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Quality flag set
customer_reviews.text: I currently use this set for conditioning with my team and for just a good time. The belts and flags feel durable and the velcro grips great. The flags were thicker than i thought which is a good thing and the belts fit most. All in all it was a good buy with the added cones for drills, carrying rucksack, and even an ebook with drills.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Scott A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: ... with the first set and the company was very nice to replace the set
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the first set and the company was very nice to replace the set. The replacement was pretty fast. Can't wait to use the new replacement next summer. Thank you. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are fabulous, easy to put on and easy to wipe off as needed. After a month the flags are fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My boys love it. We used it at my 9 year old’s birthday party and the kids had a great time. The belts fit my 5 y/o well and adults too because it’s adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete set that will provide an alternative to indoor video games. It is exactly as advertised. Fast delivery and great customer service. Looking forward to seeing multi generations interacting and getting some fun exercise. Think outside the box this Christmas and give the gift of friendly competition. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My son is playing flag football but wanted some belts to practice at home. This set comes with everything and we loved that it holds 3 flags. The belts were easy to put on and seem to be well made. My family has enjoyed playing around with them and they've held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Naverly

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fast delivery. The flags and belts are definitely very durable and seem like they will last through many games of flag football! I love that everything came in a small backpack as well. Perfect for carrying to/from the field. The eBook is also very informative and was sent to me immediately. Definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and my kids (and the entire neighborhood!) have been playing with it since it arrived. Heavy duty flags have taken a beating and they are still intact. Only down side is the belt can be tricky for younger kids to put on/take off by themselves Overall, great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn in MA

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old grandson plays flag football and loves this set! Service from this company is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with my purchase. The materials and stitching will no doubt last for years. I will most likely be buying another set from this company very soon as the number of players keeps increasing.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to play our annual game so no one can cheat this year. It worked perfectly! Didn’t have an issue with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We started a little flag football get together and they’re perfect, all the guys big and small were able to wear them
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good purchase, we use this for practice. Everything was there and in new condition perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. These seem sturdy. My grandson used them for his birthday party and they had a blast. I like that the entire belt doesn't come off when you pull one flag off.
customer_reviews.author: Bel B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I could get the younger ones off their phones/tablets/tv. We had a blast enjoying our time out doors with our family and friends. Very good material!! The flags didn't fall no matter how fast we ran. But they did come off easily when the flags where ment to be pulled
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: It's a score for this flag football set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice of vendors. Delivery was very fast and I was so pleased with the quality of the football and all the accessories and game instructions needed for the game to start.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Caterina

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. Was finally able to put it to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Was finally able to put it to use with a group that ranged from ages 6 yr to over 40 with all types of body shapes. The belts all fit great on everyone, even the little ones. The flags/Velcro are also very well made. I recommend this to anyone who has the stamina to play this game. We had so much fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my sons birthday party but that’s not for a week and we have already played it a ton! We played as a family and the belts worked well for adults and little kids. My son was outside with his cousins all day playing the game! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ashpead

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift - 10 yr old loves this !
customer_reviews.author: Coy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality- fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for for my sons 10th birthday party! Quality is great, and they will fit up to adult sizes as well. Great value, thanks
customer_reviews.author: K. John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We use these to play flag football with our men of the church, and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: KingdmHeartsFan

customer_reviews.title: Yeah football
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in law and grandchildren. He was very pleased with this purchase. He feels iris something they could use for years to come since my grandchildren are young.
customer_reviews.author: M horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun playing beach flag football. This was a good buy and a good price!
customer_reviews.author: nxmtz

customer_reviews.title: Velcro release flags
customer_reviews.text: We had ordered a flag football set that had attached flags (not Velcro) from a brick and mortar and they were awful. This set is perfect and our kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Warman

customer_reviews.title: Overall..happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my nephew. He loves it! I’m not sure if he’s gotten much use out of it yet but he was very excited to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Boys are happy with this gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my nephews at Christmas time and I still hear about how much they use it - both my sisters in law have said how much they actually get out and play with their neighborhood friends and the kit has still held up one nephew is a mature 7 and the oth 11 so covers a dynamic kid age and size range
customer_reviews.author: Seetha C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is everything it claims to be and does not boast enough in it's durability and usability. I used this set with our youth group and I would recommend it to anyone! I've used other products in the past. They were more expensive and lower quality. This set is perfect for what we needed. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and it comes in a bag to store it all. My kids are enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to Print your playbook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a kids birthday. He was pumped about it. The only think I wish it came with that I didn’t have to print out was the play book. Other than that, it was a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Very pleased with the product. The kids are having a blast getting out of the house and playing football. Win Win!!

customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday gift for an active kid. Looks like good quality. Kid was duly excited!

customer_reviews.title: Great football playing kit with all the essentials.
customer_reviews.text: Just what was expected for flag football. Great kit for everything you need to get some games in.

customer_reviews.title: Thought I bought a flag football set, ended up buying 10 smiles and memories for all of us
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and had everything we needed to have a great Thanksgiving day family football game.

customer_reviews.title: Playbook is electronic
customer_reviews.text: Love the playbook, although I wish it was a hardcover that came in the package. The flags are holding up very well so far!

customer_reviews.title: The used it the second they opened it and LOVED IT! Yea to no screen time too
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift! The used it the second they opened it and LOVED IT! Yea to no screen time too:)

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm playing with 5 to 8 year olds and it helps me to teach them to NOT tackle at this age. They love grabbing the flags. Also brings some organization to backyard football. The price is very reasonable. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: michael powell

customer_reviews.title: Worked for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: We've used this set a couple times for games that involve adults and kids, the set held up well even in cold weather. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar S

customer_reviews.title: This set is great! We love it
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! We love it! The velcro is strong and the flags are a good quality. Due to the fact that the belts fit adults and children, we have been able to play as a family. There are also enough flags and belts to use for a birthday party.

The big and little kids, as well as adults, loved having their team flags. Loved that it has it's own carrying case, so we don't lose all the pieces.

customer_reviews.author: Brooke P.

product_meta.title: Trained 10 Man Flag Football Set & eBook…
feature_bullets: DURABLE & hEAVY DUTY - We've crafted our flags and belts with durable nylon so they won't tear or rip when you get tackled.
TWO FULL TEAMS: Our 46-piece set is designed to help you outfit two full flag football teams, Each belt holds 3 adjustable flags. With 5-on-5 play, you’ll enjoy endless hours of fun.
FUN OR COMPETITIVE PLAY: The Trained Sports Flag Football Set is great for backyard or park play, or even competitive games on real football fields.
PERFECT FOR KIDS OR ADULTS: Everyone loves football, so everyone should get in on the action. Our belts are designed to adjust to young children and full-sized adults.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you aren’t 100% happy with our product, simply return it with 30 days for a full, no questions asked refund. eBook delivered by email.
